attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: please insist that david miliband mp,apologise to russia,for his aggessive stance,over the russian invasion of south ossettia,after it was invaded by american backed georgian forces.after all russia has a right to react forcibly to mr milibands infantile and outmoded remarks.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
